summary: A beast gets loose in a laboratory, killing all in it's way. A former scientist, now working as a custodian tries to stop it.
cast: Brion James|Carolyn Ann Clark|Milton Raphael Murill|Embeth Davidtz|Neil McCarthy|Lindsay Orbach|Greg Latter|Brian O'Shaughnessy|Denis Smith|Lyn Hooker|Tjaart Potgieter|Charles Comyn|Martin Dewee|Brad Morris|Sean Beukes|Gavin Young|Thomas Mlambo|Patrick Thornton|Mary Thornton|Nicholas Ashby|Glen Gabela|Zane Meas|Irene Stephanou|Warren Bader|Jurgen Hellberg
keywords: experiment gone wrong|scientist hero|exploding building|monster|animal fetus
title: Mutator
